title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. In the following article, you will learn about dozens of indications for seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. What does it mean to see a clear sea in a dream? Why did jurists warn against seeing a raging sea in a dream? Follow the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for an online dream interpretation site. Seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. The symbol of the sea in a dream is very complex, and the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman is full of different connotations, as follows: See catching fish from Sea: In fact, this term refers to collecting and keeping money, because fish are intended for money and earning a living. If the dreamer catches a lot of fish in a dream and brings them back to her home, the vision shows the abundance of goodness in her home and she will enjoy a high status and a higher position in society. The vision indicates Fishing sometimes leads to childbirth, especially if the dreamer dreams of catching one or two fish. In a dream. Seeing a shark in the sea: If a married woman sees a huge shark emerging from the sea in a dream, this is a very serious warning, because it may be the prey of a fierce enemy in reality. If a married woman sees that she is swimming in the sea and reaches the shore before it attacks her Shark, the vision is promising and indicates escaping from enemies and obtaining safety and protection. Seeing the sea in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that the symbol of the sea can indicate travel, livelihood, problems, sins, and many other connotations that will become clear in the interpretations of the following visions: See the extract Precious stones from the sea: If a married woman dreams that she is swimming in the sea and takes out pearls and coral, then the dream indicates wealth and high status. The vision may indicate the birth of good and religious children in reality. Seeing shrimp in the sea: If a married woman dreams that the sea contains A lot of shrimp, the dream indicates good halal money that she will get soon. If a woman sees that the sea is full of blood, but she does not care, and takes fish and shrimp from it, then the vision is evidence that the dreamer does not care about religious standards, and runs away after collecting forbidden money. Reality. Seeing colorful fish in the sea: A married woman who sees in a dream many colorful fish in the sea, lives a happy and stable life in reality. But if a woman sees in a dream a colorful dead fish in the sea, the vision indicates sadness, despair and loss. Seeing the Black Sea In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees the sea frightening and black in a dream, the vision is bad, and it warns her that she is walking on an unrighteous path, because she has taken the path of sin. A path and path for her in her life, and she must return to the path of truth, and ask forgiveness from the Lord of the Great Throne for the sins she committed... in the past. But if the married dreamer fell into the Black Sea in a dream, but came out of it and felt happy because he was saved from loss, then the vision Evidence of repentance

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing stairs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing stairs in a dreamInterpretation of seeing yourself climbing ladders or ladders in a dream? Is the vision of descending the stairs interpreted as bad meanings and connotations? Learn about the interpretation of seeing stairs in the dream of a single, married, pregnant, and divorced woman through this article. Follow them below. You have a dream that is confusing you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site on the Internet. Stairs in a dream. Al-Nabulsi said that the symbol of a ladder in a dream indicates safety and peace in life. Climbing stairs or stairs quickly in a dream is evidence of speedy success and achieving one’s goal. Seeing stairs on a mountain, and the dreamer climbing them in a dream until he reaches the top of the mountain, indicates his superiority and perseverance in achieving desires. Climbing stairs with difficulty in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s suffering, as it is He will not achieve what he wants except after hardships and heartaches and putting more effort and time on the ground. If the dreamer climbs the new stairs in the dream, the merchant sees a new page in his life full of good and successful deals. Al-Nabulsi explained that the symbol of the new ladder is a sign of piety and purity for the disobedient dreamer. Because he believes in God and lives his life in a sound religious way. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his stairs have become old and dilapidated and he buys new, strong stairs, then he will gain fame, money and an abundance of goodness in reality and his life will change and become brighter and more successful than it was in the past. Al-Nabulsi continued his various interpretations of The symbol of the stairs, and he said that the wooden stairs are not benign in a dream, and this is interpreted with great anxiety, and if the traveler sees if he climbs a wooden stairs in a dream, he will. He does not find comfort in traveling, and he will be very exhausted by the time he reaches his goal. Sometimes seeing climbing a wooden staircase in a dream means that the dreamer wants to teach the rules of religion to evil people and indulge in satanic lusts and passions, and therefore his efforts with these people will be futile and useless. Stairs in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that seeing stairs standing or rising on the ground means physical strength and enjoyment of vitality and health. But if the dreamer sees in a dream the stairs resting on the ground, this is a sign of the presence of physical problems and many diseases. Seeing a wooden ladder in a dream means evil It indicates hypocrisy and bad intentions. Whoever uses the wooden stairs to climb a place in a dream is a hypocritical person, and in reality he befriends hypocrites like him, and tries to seek their help and guide them to achieve his goals. If the dreamer sees that he is accompanying an influential and successful person in society, and climbs the stairs with him in a dream, this is interpreted That the dreamer will succeed like the person he saw in a dream. The staircase in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about a staircase for an unmarried woman will be good if she sees that she climbed the stairs with a handsome young man, and this indicates a stable and happy marriage soon. The golden staircase in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her fame. And her great success, and she can become a rich girl with a high status. But if you see that a golden staircase is going up, and the feeling of the staircase is very hot

title: Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a single and married woman

preview.html: Seeing darkness in a dream seems disturbing and frightening at the same time, and the interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream has many interpretations. It can be a symbol of anxiety and distress or a way out of a problem and improving conditions better, so we will learn together about the interpretation of the vision according to superior interpreters. Interpretation Seeing darkness in a dream The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing darkness in a dream as departing from the path of obedience. Whoever sees the darkness of the night, the dream shows his concealment over people. As for seeing darkness during the day, it shows severe injustice, as seeing complete darkness symbolizes anxiety and sadness, but seeing darkness in general symbolizes difficulty in making a decision. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing darkness in a dream as the dreamer’s injustice and cruelty. Whoever sees that he came out of a dark place, let him repent. If he disobeys, he will be forgiven if he is imprisoned, and he will be healed if he is sick. Whoever sees himself in a dark place and lights it up, this indicates the light of his heart and insight. Seeing the darkness of the sea in a dream symbolizes the oppression of the Sultan, and whoever sees the sky dark and gloomy in his dream, the vision shows the spread of high prices and diseases. In the dark, the dream indicates the appearance of a misfortune. Whoever sees resting in the dark, the dream indicates a lack of religion, and as for seeing prayer in the dark, it is a sign of unacceptable work, and sometimes seeing darkness symbolizes fatigue and illness, so whoever sees it loses a child. Or a face dear to him in the dark. The vision indicates the outbreak of a revolution. Seeing darkness in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees darkness in a dream, this indicates the deterioration of her condition, but if she sees her house in the dark, the vision symbolizes separation from the husband, and the vision of sitting in a house Dark stranger. An indication that people's relationship is deceitful and lying. And if she sees herself walking with her husband in a dark place, this indicates his participation in corrupt actions, but if she sees her husband only in the dark, this shows the corruption of his morals, and God knows best, and she sees him going out. From darkness to light, it shows repentance and a return to the path of truth. He also sees a light in the darkness and this indicates the approaching relief in her life. And if he sees that he is walking in a dark and fearful path, then the dream shows that he has left the path of corruption, and if he cries in the darkness, then the vision shows that he He will get out of court. Interpretation of a dream about darkness on the road: If a person sees in his dream that he is walking on a dark road, this indicates his confusion and inability to make any decision, and this indicates his loss and deviation from the right path. And if he sees that he is walking alone on a dark road, then the vision indicates a path Evil, but if he is afraid of walking in a dark path, then this is a sign of his straying from the path of truth. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees darkness in her dream, the vision indicates worry and sadness, and if she sees that she is walking in the darkness alone, this indicates her distance. Through religion and the dream of fear of the dark. A woman’s dream shows her sadness over something, and if she sees herself screaming in the dark, this indicates her need for help. If she sees herself sitting in a dark room, this indicates sadness, but if she sees herself sitting in a dark room, this indicates sadness.

title: Rosary in a dream and dream interpretation Rosary for unmarried women

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome to the dream interpretation website. Our meeting today is about the interpretation of the rosary in a dream or the interpretation of the dream of the rosary, where we find everything that has been mentioned by the great interpreters about this vision or dream. Among the topics covered in this article: the interpretation of the rosary in a dream for married women, single women, as well as pregnant women, as you discover the interpretation of the white, green, black and blue rosary, and above all we present the interpretation of the rosary in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of the rosary by Ibn Sirin The rosary in a dream is a righteous, respected woman, and she is the faithful wife of the one who saw it and she is a good, lawful life, and whoever swims with it in a dream gets years of fruitful life, and he who buys it marries a virgin or gives birth to a girl, and whoever gives it benefits its owner and gives it to him, and whoever accepts it is a gift presented to him by the world with all its contents. In it are good things, and whoever loses it in his sleep, or the rosary is stolen, or sold, has lost those who loved it. Seeing the rosary in a single dream The rosary in a single dream is a world full of gifts. It is a sign of her obedience to her Lord and a sign of her purity. The white rosary indicates a dream marriage, and the blue rosary indicates success and progress, and the green rosary indicates the righteousness of religion and ideal morals, and it can indicate prayer or testimony, and the rosary in her hand is good, and means security and safety, and whoever dreams that he gives her a gift or gives her a black rosary, this is a sign of a blessed and lasting marriage. Seeing the rosary in a married woman's dream The rosary in a married woman's dream is a good life, or a world full of joy, and the married woman who sees in her dream that her husband gives her a white rosary, she is blessed with pregnancy and the blue rosary in a dream is money and food, and the green rosary in a dream is the purity of her daughters and her good upbringing of them, and the rosary in general in a married woman's dream is safety and prosperity, and its meaning is a successful marital relationship, and it is also an indicator of livelihood and wealth, and God knows best. Seeing the rosary in a pregnant woman's dream The rosary appears in a pregnant woman's dream or symbolizes a newborn, and seeing it in a dream indicates a desire in the mind that comes true, and the rosary in a pregnant woman's dream is like other women. Good luck or good luck. The meaning of green rosaries in a dream The green rosary symbolizes good deeds or sincere worship, and it is said that it is close to God. Whoever buys it in a dream buys the afterlife with his work and prayers, and whoever loses it or sells it or sees it stolen from him. Then he falls into sin or hatred and then repents. The meaning of the blue rosary in a dream The blue rosary in a dream indicates success in the educational level and the blue rosary can benefit the viewer in a business or study trip, and for the patient in a dream it is his recovery. The meaning of the black rosary in a dream The black rosary in a man's dream is authority or benefit that he gains from influence and power. It is said that the black rosary is a strange woman whom the fortune teller marries and in a woman's dreams it indicates marriage, pregnancy or good in the future. The meaning of the white rosary

The rosary appears in a pregnant woman’s dream or symbolizes a newborn baby, and seeing it in a dream indicates a desire in the mind that is fulfilled, and the rosary in a pregnant woman’s dream is like other women. The meaning of the black rosary in a dream. The black rosary in a man’s dream It is a power or benefit gained from influence and authority. It is said that the black rosary is a strange woman whom the fortuneteller will marry, and in a woman’s dreams it indicates marriage, pregnancy, or goodness in the future. The meaning of the white rosary

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing salmon in a dream

preview.html: Seeing salmon in a dreamInterpretation: Seeing salmon in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates a great treasure and inheritance that the dreamer will receive. Seeing salmon in a dream is one of the visions of goodness and great wealth for the dreamer. Seeing salmon in the lake also shows benefit and is a symbol of a new life that will be better. From the past. Seeing eating salmon in a dream means recovering from illness, improving conditions, and being freed from worries and problems. Seeing salmon in a dream means getting rid of problems and defeating enemies and haters. Catching salmon in a dream is a good omen and a sign of fulfilling desires and obtaining great opportunities. Seeing salmon in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about eating salmon for an unmarried woman indicates that she will move to a higher position and achieve many desires and goals. Salmon in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of an imminent marriage and the acquisition of a suitable and rich person. Seeing yourself buying salmon in The dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates a great diet that this girl will receive. If you see yourself taking a fish from someone you know in a dream, this indicates kindness between them and is one of the dreams that indicates engagement. Salmon in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing fish Salmon in a dream for a married woman is one of the praiseworthy visions promising her great good. Also, the dream of a husband taking salmon for a married woman symbolizes pregnancy and feeding a good heir. To dream of buying or catching salmon for a woman is good news, money, and good luck. Seeing salmon in a dream for a woman Married means that the coming days will be free of problems, worries, and heart pain. Salmon in a dream for a woman is one of the dreams that indicate that she will achieve what she wants and desires from God Almighty. Salmon in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing salmon in water in a dream for a pregnant woman expresses goodness and nourishment. The abundance that will come to her from the new baby, God willing. Also, seeing salmon in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of upcoming happiness and joys, and hearing good news. The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman eating salmon in a dream is one of the desired visions and an indicator of easy childbirth. Eat Salmon in a dreamInterpretation scholars have explained to us that seeing salmon in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate blessing and blessings. Eating fresh and delicious salmon in a dream is evidence of the great benefits and money that the dreamer will receive. Seeing spoiled salmon in a dream means unhappy events and indicates To corruption in this world.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you as soon as possible.

Also, the dream of a husband taking salmon for a married woman symbolizes pregnancy and feeding a good heir. To dream of buying or catching salmon for a woman is good news, money, and good luck. Seeing salmon in a dream for a woman Married means that the coming days will be free of problems, worries, and heart pain. Salmon in a dream for a woman is one of the dreams that indicate that she will achieve what she wants and desires from God Almighty. Salmon in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing salmon in water in a dream for a pregnant woman expresses goodness and nourishment. The abundance that will come to her from the new baby, God willing. Also, seeing salmon in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of upcoming happiness and joys, and hearing good news. The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman eating salmon in a dream is one of the desired visions and an indicator of easy childbirth. Eat Salmon in a dreamInterpretation scholars have explained to us that seeing salmon in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate blessing and blessings. Eating fresh and delicious salmon in a dream is evidence of the great benefits and money that the dreamer will receive. Seeing spoiled salmon in a dream means unhappy events and indicates To corruption in this world.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you as soon as possible.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dreams about seeing a wasp?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream of seeing a wasp in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing a wasp in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life who does not want to be good and hates him. It also indicates a sign of illness and suffering or a stifling economic crisis, as we find that the sting indicates the intention of others to harm you, and if If you kill wasps, you will be able to strangle your enemies and defend your rights without fear. Killing wasps indicates victory over enemies. Follow with us the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing wasps in a dream. Dream of seeing a wasp by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin says in a dream that the wasp denotes the opponent and the enemy, and buries hatred. And hatred and envy. And whoever sees in his dream that a wasp has stung him, his vision shows that the dreamer has opponents and enemies who hate him or are jealous of him because of the envy that afflicts him with those who hate you. And whoever sees in his dream that he is killing wasps or wasps in the dream, because the vision shows the strength of the dreamer and his ability to besiege him and despise his enemy, Where it shows the death of danger and its victory. Enemies. And the fulfillment of his desire. It is said that the dream of seeing a wasp in a dream indicates the estrangement that occurs between two close friends and lovers of each other, and it may indicate the loss of money. And for a girl who saw in her dream that a wasp stung her, or that she was in a house of wasps, her vision indicates that there are several... Women who seek to tarnish her image and reputation in front of others. A wasp in an unmarried woman’s dream is a man who wants to dishonor her and has a bad character. A married woman quarrels with her husband or quarrels with his family. Wasps or hornets often enter a place or place, indicating an army attack And brave and courageous soldiers, and it is said that the hornet symbolizes the power of the ruler, his soldiers and his army and indicates war, conflicts and fighters. The hornet at another point of interpretation symbolizes a man who advocates lies, an ugly fool, without chivalry or religion. A hornet’s sting, sting, or sting indicates bad Speech and relief, and they come from harmful and distracted people. You dream of seeing a wasp about Nabulsi. Wasps in a dream symbolize a hostile enemy, and sometimes wasps in visions symbolize thieves, thugs, and thieves. It is said that a wasp in a dream symbolizes a man who profits from what is forbidden and is immoral and a criminal. If the dreamer sees that wasps have entered his town or city, this indicates anxiety and distress. A wasp or hornet in a dream often indicates a man covered in blood, a murderer, or a criminal, and indicates Also to a person with an unpleasant character who does not bring any benefit. If the dreamer dreams that he is killing wasps, catching them, or gently tapping them with his sole or shoe, this means that he has overcome trials and difficulties and achieved victory over enemies. If he sees him fleeing from his enemy or He defeats him until he defeats him or repel evil and evil for himself. Seeing wasps chasing a person indicates that he is suffering from pain, strife, and illness, and resisting and killing them indicates recovery from illness, overcoming difficulties, and solving problems. The sound of drones in a dream, symbolizes false and false promises from an enemy or A friend harbors hostility. The sound of wasps or hornets indicates F

title: Seeing a crocodile in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a crocodile in a dream is one of the dreams that has many connotations. It is not good, especially since the crocodile is a predatory animal, and it is one of the types of animals that live in water. The appearance of a crocodile in reality leads to the spread of fear, which indicates that if you see a crocodile in a dream, this indicates anxiety. And fear, and therefore the dreamer is looking for an explanation for this vision, which we will try to present to him during this article so that the dreamer will know the interpretation of this vision, but as general information through which he can learn about the general form of the appearance of the crocodile in the dream, but when there is a need to interpret this dream, it is better to consult Dream Interpreter Because the interpretation of a dream does not depend solely on the vision that the dreamer saw. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a crocodile in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a crocodile in a dream is an indication of adventure. Also, a crocodile in a dream indicates that The dreamer is always looking for renewal in life. In addition, Ibn Sirin says about seeing a crocodile running in a dream, that this indicates that the dreamer always likes confrontation, but postpones it. Also, a crocodile bite in a dream indicates that the dreamer should always pay attention to Details in life. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Seeing a crocodile in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a crocodile in a dream indicates that she is suffering from injustice and unfairness in life. As for an unmarried girl who dreams of escaping from a crocodile, this indicates that she was able to save herself. From some misfortunes and sorrows, and God knows best. In general, seeing a crocodile in a dream for an unmarried woman and killing it indicates the fear that filled the girl from the exam, but she was able to pass it. Read also: Penguin in a dreamSeeing a crocodile in a dream for a married womanA married woman who sees a crocodile in a dream indicates To the fact that she is afraid of falling into a certain situation. Also, if a married woman dreams of riding a crocodile on its back, this means that she was able to get rid of many marital problems, and God knows best. As for the friendly crocodile in the dream, this indicates getting rid of many of the problems that the married woman was facing. And she was able to escape from her worries - God willing. Seeing a crocodile in a dream Eating a crocodile in a dream is a sign of victory over enemies. Just like seeing a crocodile skin and taking it in a dream or fattening a crocodile, this indicates wealth and wealth - God willing. As for For the dreamer who is chasing a crocodile, this indicates the dreamer’s bad behavior and the wrong decisions he makes. In addition to being chased by a crocodile in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer has fallen into a big problem that he is trying to get out of, and God knows best. Read also: Washing the dead Seeing the small crocodile in the house In a dream for an unmarried woman: A girl who sees a crocodile in a dream indicates the anxiety and fear that she feels in reality. Also, seeing a crocodile in a dream means

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bat in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing a bat in a dream indicates a malicious, malicious and cunning person, because the vision can indicate fear, anxiety, or a lack of religion. Bats fly like flying animals, but they are harmful to humans and can pose many dangers to humans. It is possible to remove the skin of the face. Live bats live in groups and colonies, and the colony may contain 1,000 bats. They are nocturnal animals that sleep for hours during the day and wake up at night, and begin to wander in many areas. There are different types of bats, including large bats and small bats. Size, including large bats. Bats in Africa, and seeing bats in a dream is a cause for annoyance for a person, and seeing a bat in a woman’s dream differs in its interpretation of a man’s vision, and we will explain that in this article, the interpretation of a dream about seeing a bat in a dream for a single woman. A bat in a dream indicates bad news, problems, and fears, as it indicates Also to bad friends. Interpretation of a dream about a bat by Ibn Sirin: Bats in a dream indicate the reputation of a pure-hearted person. Bats in a dream indicate a lack of religion and fear of life. A black bat indicates the enemy. Bats are often a sign of the presence of an evil woman. Dead bats In a dream it indicates bad luck. Seeing a bat flying is a sign of happiness. Seeing a bat in a dream often indicates that the dreamer has strayed from God’s path. Anyone who sees a bat in a dream will attack them and face many problems and misfortunes. A bat attacking a person in a dream indicates To the loss of a person. Bats are evidence of a woman trying to destroy homes. Read also: Interpretation of a dream to see bats in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about bats for a single woman: Seeing black bats in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a lack of religion and mistakes committed by that girl. The bat indicates in some of the girl’s visions To longevity. A bat in a single person’s dream sometimes indicates fear and cunning. Read also: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing an owl in a dream or a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bat for a man: A bat in a man’s dream indicates that he is a person trying to hide the truth from others. Seeing a man slaughtering a bat in a dream indicates On the enemies present in his life. Seeing a young man with the eyes of a bat in a dream indicates good luck. If he sees a bat hitting him, this is a sign of a person who wishes you good luck. A bat that flies in a young man’s dream indicates money and enormous livelihood. A bat in a young man’s dream is evidence of treatment. Read also: Dream interpretation of seeing an owl in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about bats for a pregnant woman: A bat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good health for the fetus. Seeing black bats in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of faltering childbirth. Seeing dead bats indicates problems Which a pregnant woman faces during pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about a bat for a married woman: A bat in a married woman’s dream is evidence of an imminent pregnancy. The bat could be

title: Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is one of the dreams that carries a number of different connotations and meanings, depending on the condition of the carpet and the dreamer’s condition in the dream. The carpet is the carpet that is spread in the house and adds beauty to the home’s furniture, and seeing it in a dream is one of the strange things that prompts the viewer to search. About the interpretation related to it, and we will show you in our article the interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained seeing carpets in a dream in a group of different interpretations and interpretations, as this varies according to the social status of the dreamer. In addition to the clues and symbols that the dreamer says and the events that occurred in the dream. The dream, and among these interpretations are the following: A rug in a dream expresses the ease and ease of things and their progress according to the dreamer’s desire, and indicates a long life, abundance of sustenance, profits and money. Also, if a person sees in a dream a carpet furnished in a place other than the place where he lives or with People he does not know, this portends the arrival of comfort, achieving goodness, and living, especially if the dreamer is traveling. In addition, if the dreamer sees that he is buying carpets in a dream, this means that the dreamer will buy a new house, plot of land, or property, or may open a profitable project soon. Also, if the dreamer sees that he is laying carpets and spreading them somewhere, then this vision carries an indication that the dreamer will reach a prominent position among the people of that place, in addition to that it is an indication of the simplicity of the dreamer and that God wants to increase his livelihood and increase the energy of his land, and God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a single sheikh and a married woman, Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a carpet in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a carpet in a dream for a married woman is considered one of the good dreams that convey happy and good news to the monarch, as it expresses the goodness and happiness that filled her life, and among these interpretations are what scholars have reported. About the interpretation in this chapter including: Seeing a carpet in a dream for a married woman indicates that the house is full of happiness and joy, and it also indicates that the dreamer is comfortable in her life and that she is earning a halal livelihood. In addition, being furnished in a wide and spacious place in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it indicates that the dreamer’s married life will change for the better and she will envy her for the blessing of pleasure and wealth that she enjoys. It is known that the interpretation of a dream about a veil varies according to its type in the vision, but everything is good. Especially if a married woman sees carpets decorated with bright colors and geometric shapes, the interpretation of this indicates On the calm and stability of the dreamer’s financial and emotional life, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of carpets in a dream for a married woman differs from a dream about washing carpets, but it is also considered one of the good dreams that bring good news to the fortuneteller, and we present to you what it indicates: We find Cleaning and washing carpets in a dream means...
